sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Building an active and engaged community is essential to the success of any project especially in the cryptocurrency and blockchain space. A strong community can provide valuable feedback, support, and advocacy, helping to drive adoption and growth. However, creating and sustaining a community requires a strategic and holistic approach. This Community Development and Engagement Plan outlines a detailed strategy for creating and sustaining a thriving community around the project.

sections.title: Incentives
items: Token rewards for participating in discussions, sharing content, and referring friends
Exclusive access to project updates, events, and merchandise for loyal community members
Early access to new features or services for active community participants
Recognition and showcasing of top contributors on social media and project channels
Opportunities for community members to participate in project governance and decision-making
Access to exclusive community channels or groups for top contributors
Personalized support and feedback from project team members for top contributors
Incentives for community members to create and share high-quality content
Incentives for community members to participate in community-driven proposals

sections.title: Tournament
sections.description: Delimity to create attractive content, solve problems, and participate in discussions every month. Monthly competitions include prizes like exclusive access to tokens, products, or design events.
details: Theme competitions (e.g., 'Share Your Story', 'LOGO') promote creativity and interaction
Competitions for development of teamwork and innovation (hackathons, group projects, etc.)
Competitions with various levels of complexity and qualifications
Clear arbitration rules and standards to ensure fairness and transparency
Clear timeline and calendar to ensure sequence and predictability

sections.title: AMA (Ask Me Anything)
sections.description: Regular AMAs with project teams, partners, and industry experts to engage the community.
details: AMAs on various themes (e.g., technology, marketing, management) to satisfy different interests
Exclusive access to future events for AMA participants
Clear planning, graphic guides, and principles to ensure smooth implementation
Follow-up AMAs to address unresolved issues

sections.title: IUDs (Incentivized User-Generated Content)
items: Encourage community members to create and share content (blog posts, videos, art) about the project
Offer token rewards or other incentives for high-quality content
Provide content categories (e.g., tutorials, reviews, testimonials) to guide community creations
Feature top content on project channels
Maintain a content calendar to ensure regular and diverse content publication
Provide clear guidelines and templates for content creation and submission

sections.title: CPAs (Community-Driven Proposals)
sections.description: Allow community members to propose and vote on project initiatives or features, encouraging engagement and ownership.
details: Clear guidelines and templates for submitting proposals
Incentives for participating in proposal discussions and voting
Regular proposal cycles to ensure consistent community engagement

Community Guidelines: No sharing of sensitive or confidential information
Conflict Resolution: Establish a clear process for reporting and resolving conflicts
Designate community moderators to enforce guidelines and resolve disputes
Regular moderation team meetings to discuss challenges and improvements
Clear escalation procedures for severe conflicts or issues

sections.title: Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
metrics: Community growth: Member count, engagement rates (likes, comments, shares), retention rates, net promoter score (NPS), community satisfaction surveys
Content quality and engagement: Quality of user-generated content, engagement with content (views, likes, comments), content diversity and creativity, content calendar adherence
Community sentiment: Sentiment analysis of community discussions, net promoter score (NPS), community feedback and suggestions, conflict resolution success rates

sections.title: Community Ambassadors
sections.description: Establish a program to recognize and empower top community contributors.
details: Community Ambassadors will serve as representatives of the project and community
Ambassadors will receive exclusive incentives and opportunities for leadership and growth
Ambassadors will be responsible for leading community initiatives and events

sections.title: Community Council
sections.description: Establish a community council to provide guidance and oversight on community initiatives.
details: Council members will be elected by the community and serve for a fixed term
Council will meet regularly to discuss community issues and initiatives
Council will provide recommendations to the project team on community-related matters

sections.title: Community Events
sections.description: Host regular community events such as webinars, meetups, and conferences to educate, engage, and entertain the community.
details: Events will be held online and offline depending on the location and preferences of the community
Events will be promoted through social media and community channels

sections.title: Community Feedback Loop
sections.description: Establish a feedback loop to ensure that community feedback is heard and incorporated into the project.
details: Feedback will be collected through surveys, polls, and community discussions
Feedback will be reviewed and prioritized by the project team
Feedback will be implemented and communicated to the community

sections.title: Community Governance
sections.description: Establish a governance model to ensure that the community has a say in project decision-making.
details: Governance model will include community voting and representation
Governance model will be designed to ensure that the community is aligned with the project's goals and values
